attributes.action: End the industrial farming of animals
attributes.additional_details:
Animal Liberation, by Peter Singer:
http://www.amazon.co.uk/Animal-Liberation-Peter-Singer/dp/1847923844/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1443183216&sr=8-1&keywords=Animal+Liberation

The Reality of Factory Farming:
http://www.nsfwyoutube.com/watch?v=zF7Ega_TpZE

Choose Veg:
http://www.chooseveg.com

Meet your Meat:
http://www.nsfwyoutube.com/watch?v=sZs1vodBxP0
attributes.background:
Industrial farming, or intensive animal farming, involves the concentration and exploitation of sentient life forms in confined spaces. The main products of this unethical industry are meat, milk and eggs for human consumption. 

Industrial farming is unethical and a hazard to human health.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think these petitions are similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105416
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105801
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106127

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
